name: Box Shooter (rickydaricky)
description:
Box Shooter is a first-person shooter within a miniature environment in which you shoot the green and white boxes for points and extra time and avoid the yellow boxes.

Controls:

- WSAD and spacebar to move around and jump

- Mouse 1 to shoot

- Esc key to unlock mouse

This game was built as part of Coursera's Introduction to Game Development course, offered by Michigan State University.
